articles.author: Bailey Schulz, USA TODAY
articles.title: Canada could be reopening its borders to vaccinated Americans this summer - USA TODAY
articles.description: Trudeau indicated that fully vaccinated U.S. citizens and permanent residents cross its border starting mid-August.
articles.content:
Canadian borders could be reopening to U.S. travelers this summer. 
During a call with the country’s premiers, Canada Prime Minister Justin Trudeau indicated that fully vaccinated U.S. citizens and … [+1581 chars]

articles.title: COVID breakthrough infections strike summer tourists visiting Provincetown - Bay Area Reporter, America's highest circulation LGBT newspaper
articles.description: Dozens of summer tourists who were among those visiting the gay resort town of Provincetown, Massachusetts over the weekend came back with more than beach memories and a tan: They tested positive for COVID-19 — even though they were fully vaccinated.
articles.content: Dozens of summer tourists who were among those visiting the gay resort town of Provincetown, Massachusetts over the weekend came back with more than beach memories and a tan: They tested positive for… [+9467 chars]

articles.title: Olympics 2020: Which Premier League players are involved in Tokyo tournament? - Goal.com
articles.description: Sixteen nations are vying for the title of best national team in North America, Central America and the Caribbean (CONCACAF). Mexico is the favorite to repeat as champion, with the USA expected to challenge for the trophy that will be awarded Aug. 1 in Las Ve…
